title: Movie Studio 2022 Suite
description: Simplicity is key with movie Studio: from importing your media quickly with drag and drop to using the most advanced features. No matter your skills or knowledge, editing your videos should always be intuitive and fun. Use the automatic workflows, or explore Infinite creative possibilities. The powerful infusion engine 2 speeds up your projects: incredibly fast import times allow you to Dive straight into the smooth editing workflow, edit faster and take full control of your footage. Only available in English (please note that if you own already movie edit Pro or video Deluxe this product is similar).
